title: Wells of Change
hero_subtitle: Bringing clean water to communities in need, one well at a time
about_subtitle: Working toward a world where everyone has access to clean water
about_text: Wells of Change is dedicated to addressing the global water crisis by building sustainable water projects in communities that lack access to clean water. Since 2018, we have partnered with local organizations and communities to implement long-lasting solutions that improve health, education, and economic opportunities.
about_text_2: Our approach focuses on community involvement, sustainability, and education to ensure that each project continues to provide clean water for generations to come. We believe that access to clean water is a fundamental human right and the foundation for breaking the cycle of poverty.
projects_subtitle: See how we're making a difference around the world
project_1_desc: We build both shallow and deep wells depending on local conditions and water tables.
project_2_desc: Installing filtration systems in communities with contaminated water sources.
project_3_desc: Teaching proper sanitation and hygiene practices to maximize health benefits.
impact_subtitle: See how access to clean water transforms communities
impact_1_text: Communities with access to clean water see up to 80% reduction in waterborne diseases, leading to fewer sick days and lower healthcare costs.
impact_2_text: When children don't have to spend hours collecting water, school attendance increases by 40%, especially among girls who are often responsible for water collection.
impact_3_text: Access to clean water saves time and improves health, allowing community members to focus on income-generating activities and education.
contact_text: Reach out to us for more information or to get involved
contact_description: Interested in learning more about our work or how you can support our mission? We'd love to hear from you. Contact us by email or follow us on social media for updates.
